<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bloodletting Claws](/Feats.aspx?ID=2900) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 68 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your eidolon inflicts bleeding wounds on a telling blow. If your eidolon critically hits with a melee [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) Strike that deals slashing or piercing damage, its target takes 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). Your eidolon gains an item bonus to this bleed damage equal to the unarmed attack's item bonus to attack rolls. This is a [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).

<title level="2">Bloodletting Claws leads to...</title>
[Blood Frenzy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2909)
name: Bloodletting Claws
